casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. William Jones (13536)

Dupont, C. J., and O’Connell and Lavery, Js.

Argued December 9, 1994 decision released January 3, 1995 Lauren Weisfeld, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant). PamelaS. Meotti, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Michael Dearington, state’s attorney, and Michael Pepper, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.1

This appeal was taken originally to the Supreme Court. Pursuant to Practice Book § 4023, the Supreme Court transferred the appeal to this court.
